quote: I realise that a novel and a film are different mediums. As artistes, we need to respect other artistes. It also needs a lot of courage to take risks to experiment and interpret known literary works.
quote_letters: I REALISE THAT A NOVEL AND A FILM ARE DIFFERENT MEDIUMS AS ARTISTES WE NEED TO RESPECT OTHER ARTISTES IT ALSO NEEDS A LOT OF COURAGE TO TAKE RISKS TO EXPERIMENT AND INTERPRET KNOWN LITERARY WORKS
